name: Contrary Strike
desc: If unit attacks a magic foe with a physical attack or vice versa, grants +3 ATK.
components: (item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) and not item_funcs.is_magic(target, target.get_weapon())) or (not item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) and item_funcs.is_magic(target, target.get_weapon()))
